Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory310.png'}
{3: 'Rosetta stands outside the shop, a grim determination etched on her face.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Commandant, it's time.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Rosetta, there's no need to be so tense, right?"}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I don't say this often, and usually, when I do, it's trouble...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "But this time, I'm determined to win.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: "With a deep breath, Rosetta pushes open the shop's door.", 7: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Sir, I want to get the latest commemorative booster pack.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Card Shop Owner', 3: 'Understood. How many packs do you want, or do you prefer a whole booster box?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Please, ten boxes.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As Rosetta announces this ambitious number, all eyes in the shop turn toward her.'}
{3: "As the owner lays out ten boxes worth of booster packs, you realize Rosetta wasn't kidding."}
{2: 'How many are in here...', 3: '34', 4: 'How many Black Cards is this going to cost...', 5: '34'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "A box contains six packs, each with fifteen cards... Looks like we'll be opening packs for a while.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Don't worry. The Engineering Force pays us regularly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It'll take a long time if I do it alone. Commandant, could you help me out?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No problem.', 3: '40', 4: 'Let me share some good luck with you, Rosetta.', 5: '40'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Thank you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: "And so, side by side at the card shop's table, Rosetta and you embark on this grand project."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Still no luck.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a hint of disappointment, Rosetta opens the card pack and swiftly flips through the cards inside.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: '"Infinite Illusion", "Blue Reboot", a redrawn "White Blossom & Joyous Spring"... We got a lot of useful cards, so it\'s not a total loss...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is that card really so rare?', 3: '47'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Yes, it's made with the latest technology. They say only one is included in every five boxes, and it won't be reprinted.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is it powerful?', 3: '50', 4: 'Expensive?', 5: '52'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'No, it was released early on and has no practical value now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Not really... Though it's unique, it might not even cost a hundred Black Cards.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I just... really, really want that card.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'My first dive into this game was in the ARU, back when I was fresh in the Forest Guard and not quite part of the group yet.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I was a lone wolf until someone finally asked me to play together.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'The ace of the deck they helped me build was that card.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's more than just a card; it's a symbol ofâ€”", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Companionship, right?', 3: '63', 4: 'A bond?', 5: '63'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Indeed.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "But luck just wasn't on my side this time.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ten boxes of card packs later, and here you are, down to the last one, still no luck finding it.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "This is the last pack. Probably won't get it...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta resigns as she reaches for the scissors. But I intervene, gently taking the last pack from her hands.'}
{2: 'Can I keep the last pack?', 3: '70'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's leave it as a cliffhanger.", 3: '72', 4: 'Let me keep the last pack as a memento.', 5: '72'}
{2: 'Whether it brings good luck or bad...', 3: '73'}
{2: 'I hope you trust me enough to entrust it to me, Rosetta.', 3: '74'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It feels a bit like I'm fooling myself...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "But holding onto this glimmer of hope isn't such a bad thing, after all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'By the way, about all those cards we opened earlier...', 3: '77'}
{3: 'You glance at the mountain of cards before us.'}
{2: 'Do any of them have themes that could form a deck?', 3: '79'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Do you want to play, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: "After hearing so much about it, it's hard not to be intrigued.", 3: '81'}
{2: "I'm just not quite familiar with the rules.", 3: '82'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "No worries, I'll teach you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta assures you with a smile as bright as a campfire under a winter sky.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'The day is still young.', 4: '1'}
